properties.entry: SELECT USER_CODE , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_BDAY , USER_GENDER , USER_ADDRESS , USER_REGISTER_DATE , USER_BLOCK FROM USER ORDER BY USER_CODE LIMIT ?,?

select user.USER_CODE , user.USER_NAME , user.USER_PHONE , user.USER_BDAY , user.USER_GENDER , user.USER_ADDRESS , user.USER_REGISTER_DATE , user.USER_BLOCK , RESUME.RESUME_CODE , RESUME.RESUME_WRITE_DATE , RESUME.RESUME_SUBPHONE , RESUME.RESUME_LETTER , RESUME.RESUME_ADVANTAGE from user, resume where user.USER_CODE = RESUME.USER_CODE and user.USER_CODE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_BLOCK = 1;
SELECT USER_CODE , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_BDAY , USER_GENDER , USER_ADDRESS , USER_REGISTER_DATE , USER_BLOCK FROM USER WHERE USER_BLOCK = 1 LIMIT ?,?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_BLOCK = 0;
SELECT USER_CODE , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE , USER_BDAY , USER_GENDER , USER_ADDRESS , USER_REGISTER_DATE , USER_BLOCK FROM USER WHERE USER_BLOCK = 0 LIMIT ?,?
